about.title: Our Story
about.body: Founded in 2010 by Dr. Jennifer Walsh, Strategic Solutions has helped over 200 businesses achieve their growth objectives. Our team combines deep industry expertise with proven methodologies to deliver measurable results.
about.subtitle: Why choose Strategic Solutions

founder.name: Dr. Jennifer Walsh
founder.title: Founder & Principal Consultant
founder.bio: Former McKinsey consultant with 20+ years of experience helping businesses scale. PhD in Business Strategy from Wharton, specializing in operational excellence and growth strategy.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our consulting services

items.question: What industries do you specialize in?
items.answer: We work primarily with manufacturing, technology, retail, and professional services firms. Our team has experience across 15+ industries, and our methodologies adapt to any business looking to scale sustainably.

items.question: How long is a typical engagement?
items.answer: Engagements typically last 4-8 weeks for project-based work, though some clients work with us ongoing as fractional executives or strategic advisors. We'll discuss the right timeline during your discovery call.

items.question: What size companies do you work with?
items.answer: We focus on businesses with $5M-$100M in annual revenue. This allows for meaningful impact while maintaining personalized attention to your unique challenges.

items.question: How is your pricing structured?
items.answer: We offer both project-based and retainer pricing depending on scope. Projects start at $1,200 and typically range from $1,500-$2,500 depending on complexity. Retainers start at $3,000/month. All pricing is transparent and agreed upon before we begin.

items.question: Will I work directly with Dr. Walsh or a team?
items.answer: You work directly with our senior consultants, including Dr. Walsh who oversees all engagements. For larger projects, you'll have a dedicated team, but Dr. Walsh is involved in strategy development and key milestones.

items.question: What results can I expect?
items.answer: While every business is different, clients typically see 20-50% revenue growth, improved operational efficiency, stronger market positioning, and clearer strategic direction. Our case studies showcase specific results achieved with recent clients.

items.question: Do you offer ongoing support after a project ends?
items.answer: Yes! Many clients transition to an advisory retainer for ongoing strategic guidance, quarterly planning sessions, and implementation support. This ensures long-term success.

items.question: How involved will I need to be?
items.answer: We work collaboratively with you and your leadership team. Expect 3-5 hours per week of your time for meetings, feedback, and decision-making. We handle the research, analysis, and heavy lifting.

items.question: Can you help with implementation or just strategy?
items.answer: Both! We're hands-on and can support implementation, or provide a detailed roadmap for your team to execute. We'll determine the right approach based on your needs, resources, and timeline.

items.question: What if I'm not sure what I need?
items.answer: That's exactly what the free 30-minute discovery call is for! We'll discuss your challenges and goals, and provide honest feedback on whether consulting is right for you and what approach makes sense.

settings.productNote: Submit your consultation request and we'll contact you within 24 hours to schedule a free 30-minute session.
